! Pedestal for Books: Emperor Frinteza suspected former heiress Solin of treason, and it hit him in disgrace. Courtiers whispered that allegedly on the advice of the Land of Rune Castle followers Solina railed against the Emperor and strongly denounced it. After learning about it. The Emperor was furious and decided to punish Solin. Then all the subjects of the empire Twilight rose to her defense, and the Emperor was forced to retreat. After this incident, Solina ceased to wander the lands of the Empire, to perform miracles and good deeds. She gathered his disciples and retired to a monastery. This monastery was named after the Monastery of Silence. He stands on the edge of the Lands Rune Castle to this day.
